name: Elvanto Mail Sync
description: Web app to sync your Elvanto groups to Google mailing lists

GOOGLE_OAUTH2_WHITELISTED_DOMAINS.description: It is strongly recommened you leave this blank. Comma separated list of domains from which anyone will be able to access the app.

GOOGLE_OAUTH2_WHITELISTED_EMAILS.description: Comma separated list of emails that can access the app. This will be ignored if any domains are whitelisted.

G_DELEGATED_USER.description: We need to impersonate a user in the domain.

G_PROJECT_ID.description: Project ID from service key file.

G_PRIVATE_KEY_ID.description: Private key ID from service key file.

G_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key from service key file.

G_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: Client email from service key file.

G_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID from service key file.

G_AUTH_URI.description: Auth URI from service key file.

G_TOKEN_URI.description: Token URI from service key file.
